info.description: Allows the viewing of Instruments - Bonds, Equities, Futures, Options, Active IPOs and Funds
info.title: API for security instruments

get.description: Retrieves the initial offer IPO instruments filtered based on the instrument id, start and end date of the offering

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: The identifier of the instrument

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Indicates the date till which the transaction history requested. If 20120101 is the start date and 20120201 is the end date, all transactions that are booked between January 1 to February 1 2012 are returned

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

get.description: Retrieves the bond instruments filtered based on the instrument id and instrument currency

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: The identifier of the instrument

parameters.name: instrumentCurrencyId
parameters.description: The currency of the instrument

parameters.name: mnemonic
parameters.description: Shortcut code for referring an Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: subAssetTypeId
parameters.description: Identifies the group of like Securities, which are reported together

parameters.name: priceType
parameters.description: Defines the method to be used when calculating the price of a trade

parameters.name: ISIN
parameters.description: The International Securities Identification Number of the instrument

parameters.name: stockExchange
parameters.description: The stock exchange identifier

parameters.name: depositoryId
parameters.description: Id of the securities depository.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

displayName.description: Name used for display or enrichment purposes

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

endDate.description: Indicates the date till which the transaction history requested. If 20120101 is the start date and 20120201 is the end date, all transactions that are booked between January 1 to February 1 2012 are returned

minOfferPrice.description: Minimum price used for bidding in IPO order

maxOfferPrice.description: Maximum price allowed to bid in IPO order

issueOfferPrice.description: Price used in IPO order when the Type of Issue is Single Bid.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

ISIN.description: The International Securities Identification Number of the instrument

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from the Security Master

lastPrice.description: Indicates the last recorded price of the instrument

priceType.description: Defines the method to be used when calculating the price of a trade

interestRate.description: Identifies the bid rate of the related currency for the defined time period

couponRate.description: Rate at which a periodic payment is made under a bond/security and also in interest rate derivatives such as Interest rate Swaps.

inflationIndex.description: Inflation Index to be considered for the Bonds

inflationIndexComponent.description: Component of Bond Security on which the inflation Index is applicable. - Interest - Principal - Both (Interest and Pricipal)

maturityDate.description: Indicates maturity date of the contract

tradingUnits.description: Specifies the smallest nominal amount that may be traded

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from the Security Master

companyDomicile.description: Specifies the country of domicile, of the parent company or government or establishment issuing the Security

instrumentDomicile.description: Specifies the country domicile of the Security being issued

lastPrice.description: Indicates the last recorded price of the instrument

lastPriceDate.description: Effective Date of Last Price of the Security

subAssetTypeId.description: Identifies the group of like Securities, which are reported together

subAssetType.description: The name of the Sub Asset Type

priceType.description: Defines the method to be used when calculating the price of a trade

priceUpdateCode.description: Specifies the type of price update that will update the price of this security

maturityDate.description: Indicates maturity date of the contract

tradingUnits.description: Specifies the smallest nominal amount that may be traded
